Exponential interpolation of one input value and 

n

output values [PDF:1.6:3.9.2].

Each input value 

x

will return 

n

values, given by 

y[j] = C0[j] + x^N × (C1[j] − C0[j])

, for 

0 ≤ j < n

, where 

C0

and 

C1

are the function results when, respectively, 

x = 0

and 

x = 1

, and 

N

is the interpolation exponent.

Gets the (inclusive) domains of the input values.

Input values outside the declared domains are clipped to the nearest boundary value.

IList<Interval<float> > org.pdfclown.documents.functions.Function.Ranges [get, inherited]

Gets the (inclusive) ranges of the output values.

Output values outside the declared ranges are clipped to the nearest boundary value; if this entry is absent, no clipping is done.

Returns:
null
in case of unbounded ranges.
